TopicTitle: Bring back the Graphical Maneuver Editor

Articles.Content:
One thing I really liked about ksp1 was the graphical maneuver editor. Instead of pulling the different vectors directly onto the position of your maneuver node, you can edit the maneuver at the bottom left of your screen:

 

This way you can easily edit a maneuver while focusing a body. The slider and text maneuver editor also give access to precision control:

 

Edited March 19, 2023 by Saab
Yes, something like that would be very helpful.

This is an absolute must.

I wish if there could also be a way to visualise and move MN position as well. For example, say you're orbiting Kerbin, and you zoom out to see what the trajectory will look like. If I want to move entire MN just a little "left" or "right", it is impossible to do precisely, due to zoom out level.
